title: Cloud RAN Security Project Manager
description:
**Grow with us**
----------------



About this opportunity

  

We are now looking for creative, upbeat, out of the box individuals with strong leadership skills to join our Engineering Unit Cloud RAN in Athlone, Ireland or Stockholm, Sweden. Cloud RAN leads the acceleration and creation of a cloud-native Radio Access Network (RAN) product offering with customer deployments. The unit consists of development functions covering the total life-cycle capability from architecture definition to deployment in customer networks & capability to contribute to open source communities. Security in the Radio Access Network becomes more and more important. 5G networks will serve as critical infrastructures to facilitate the digitization, automation, and connectivity to machines. An end-to-end security solution is key in the infrastructure. We are looking for a team driver to the team working with end-to-end vulnerability management for Cloud RAN products including vDU2.0, vCU, RANS, RLO, etc.

  

You will:  

* Understand and align the business and technical prioritizations within the Cloud RAN security area.
* Act as the interface for adding and prioritizing all types of backlog items.
* Ensure that technical solutions fulfill requirements and secure long-term strategic goals
* Secure plans and estimations related to the product area and backlog and manages deviations across Cloud RAN products
* Proactively track progress and provide status information for product area and backlog
* Identify, evaluate, define & clarify process, and drive improvements and impediments in the area
* Plan the vulnerability test scope based on feature content and input from product risk assessments
* Work close with the central security team to evolve the strategy and tooling for vulnerability management
* Drive automation of all test and analysis activities
* Give the development teams feedback based on findings from vulnerability analysis and test execution
* Experiment and use innovative technologies and methodologies
* Contribute to defining and crafting a go-get team culture, ways of working and environment
**Join our Team**
-----------------



You will have:  

* Agile project management skills and software development knowledge
* Ability to use latest industry software project management tools
* Strong capability planning and program financial management skills
* Strong knowledge of Cloud architecture, Kubernetes, and product security
* Solid knowledge about Hyperscaler cloud solutions like Google and AWS, and in-depth knowledge about their security functions
* At least 7 years of experience from working with security in the ICT industry
* Security certifications like CISSP, CISM or similar
* Good knowledge about information and IT security
* Solid technical leadership skills with a can-do attitude to make things happen
* Up to date knowledge about SW security standards and regulations
* Up to date knowledge on industry trends for security assurance technology
* 5+ years’ experience developing large scale products
* Solid knowledge in vulnerability analysis for Cloud Native products
* In depth experience from driving automation of test activities
* Excellent skills in driving change
* Experience from using tools for vulnerability testing
* Experience in leading a team toward challenging targets
* Good knowledge in product security and preferably certification as CEH (Certified Ethical Hacker) or OSCP (Offensive Security Certified Professional)
* Ability to work independently and as part of a team in a dynamic environment
  

A passed vetting is needed in the role.

  

Why join Ericsson?  

At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build never seen before solutions to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.

  

What happens once you apply?  

Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.

title: IT Technical Support Agent (Fixed term)
description:
**This is Worldline** 




 Worldline helps businesses of all shapes and sizes to accelerate their growth journey - quickly, simply, and securely. We are the innovators at the heart of the payments technology industry, shaping how the world pays and gets paid. Our technology powers the growth of millions of businesses across 5 continents. And just as we help our customers accelerate their business, we are committed to helping our people accelerate their careers. Together, we shape the evolution.
 



  





**The Opportunity** 




 We’re looking to hire an IT Technical Support Agent for a fixed term contract who will be based in Stockholm until the 31st of October 2025. There is the potential that the position is made permanent. In this role, you’ll support employees in Sweden and other Nordic countries with a wide area of IT-related matters, and be part of a Nordic Virtual Team. You will be required to travel on occasion.
 



  





 Since you are part of the international team, we hope you are able travel if needed to. You’ll work during office hours, but occasionally we might need your support in ad-hoc situations out of normal business hours. We wish to welcome an enthusiastic and dedicated colleague to join our team!
 



  





**About the team** 




 We have many hardworking and dedicated peers that would love for you to work with them. We are committed to continuous improvement. We are always looking for new and innovative ways to improve our market proposition, build excellent solutions, and grow customer happiness.
 



  





 You’ll report to IT Manager who is based in Stockholm, Sweden. The virtual team consists 3 peers in Sweden, 1 in Denmark and 1 in Finland. We are globally minded with a FinTech atmosphere. You will experience this in your everyday life as a Worldliner.
 



  





**Day-to-Day Responsibilities​** 



* Ongoing support for any local systems, services and administrative activities currently in the scope of the Local IT team which are not replaced by services delivered centrally
* CMDB maintenance
* Installations and settings-laptops
* Maintain all devices connected to WL network (printers, access badge printer, Wi-Fi routers, tv-screens, etc.)



  





**Who Are We Looking For** 




 People who can drive positive change, step up and show what’s next – people with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. You consider yourself being organized and able to prioritize multiple ongoing tasks and are used to tackle challenges proactively. Natural interest towards IT and problem solving mindset are advantage in this position.
 



  





 Skills we can't do without:
 


* OS management in a mixed environment (Windows, MacOS, iOS, Android)
* Desktop imaging and deployment practices
* Experience with purchasing, inventory, and asset management
* Microsoft Azure admin
* Setup and support printer system (MFPs) in a corporate environment.
* Open to change and must be able to adapt to new systems quickly.



  





 Skills we'd like:
 


* Experience with Servicenow
* Drivers license and car
* Network fundamentals (patching, network configs, VPN, Firewalls, wireless, etc.)
* Experience with ticket-based enterprise workflow management systems, particularly JIRA, Confluence, as well as other Atlassian products.
* Self-motivated, with out of the box thinking and a logical mind.



  





**Perks & Benefits** 




 At Worldline you’ll get the chance to be at the heart of the global payments technology industry and shape how the world pays and gets paid. On top of that, you will also:
 



  




* Health contribution
* Health check – Every 2:nd year
* Private Health Care Insurance (EuroAccident)
* Parental pay and 12 months pension during parental leave
* Opportunity to hybrid working according to company standard
* Benefit portal with many great offers, plus more.



  





**Shape the evolution.** 




 We are pushing towards the next frontiers of payments technology, and we look for big thinkers to join our journey. People with passion, can-do attitude and a hunger to learn and grow. Here you’ll work with ambitious colleagues from around the world, take on unique challenges as a team, and make a real impact on the society. And with our empowering culture, strong technology and extensive training opportunities, we help you accelerate your career. Wherever you decide to go. Join our global team of over 18,000 innovators across 40+ countries, and shape a tomorrow that is yours to own.
 



  





**Learn more about life at Worldline at
 
 jobs.worldline.com**




  





**We are proud to be an Equal Opportunity employer. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex (including pregnancy, childbirth, or related medical conditions), sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, age, status as an individual with a disability, or any applicable legally protected characteristics.**

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Trafikförvaltningen är mitt i en omfattande digital transformation som drivs på av samhällsutvecklingen och branschens digitalisering. En central roll på denna resa är att leda och arbeta med devOps-uppsättningen för trafikförvaltningens Digitala kanaler. Vi arbetar på en Azure-baserad plattform och vill öka vår förmåga inom automatisering, etablera en tydlig CI/CD struktur för sju leveransteam och bygga en stark infrastruktur för att stötta våra ambitiösa utvecklingsmål. Vågar och vill du anta utmaningen?
 



  





**Om oss** 




 Hos oss på trafikförvaltningen får du jobba med starka varumärken som SL, Waxholmsbolaget, Färdtjänst i Region Stockholm och Spårvägsmuseet. Tillsammans ansvarar vi för halva Sveriges kollektivtrafik och vi har höga ambitioner. Vi utvecklar en av världens mest hållbara och attraktiva kollektivtrafik. Och vi jobbar dagligen med att minska vår miljöpåverkan, öka social hållbarhet och ansvarfullt förvalta våra gemensamma medel. Utan oss stannar Stockholm.
 



  





**Om rollen** 




 IT-avdelningen på Trafikförvaltningen är en utvecklingsintensiv verksamhet och inom vår grupp Digitala kanaler har vi identifierat ett behov av att anställa en DevOps Engineer. Du kommer att arbeta med cloud management, CI/CD-processer, pipelines och ha det övergripande ansvaret för att alla våra miljöer följer likvärdiga strukturer. Samarbete kommer att ske med samtliga kanalteam, team som sköter backend och trafikförvaltningens operations-avdelning. Det kommer också att förutsättas ett nära samarbete med lösningsarkitekter, test/QA och domänarkitekter.
 



  





**För att trivas och lyckas i rollen behöver du:** 




 Vi söker dig som trivs med att både gräva ner dig i detaljer och samtidigt kan ta ett steg tillbaka och se helheten. Vi arbetar agilt och med hög rörlighet och experimentlusta vilket kräver robusta miljöer och en förutsägbarhet enligt best practice. Då rollen är ny förutsätter vi att du har en god förmåga att skapa och upprätthålla nya relationer och vägar och forum för att säkra att vi uppfyller krav kring kvalitet, säkerhet, prestanda mm.
 



 I rollen som strateg kommer du bland annat att ansvara för att:
 


* Kommunicera med vår större driftsavdelning
* Driva operationsdelarna av vår lösningsarkitektur
* Synka och stötta i förbättringen kring t ex automatiserade tester mm



  





 Krav:
 


* Flera års erfarenhet av arbete med Cloudbaserade plattformar
* Ett antal års aktuell erfarenhet av utveckling med .Net



  





 Meriterande:
 


* Universitetsutbildning inom IT eller motsvarande kunskaper förvärvade på annat sätt
* Ett antal års erfarenhet av arbete med Microsoft Azure
* Aktuell erfarenhet av arbete med molnarkitektur
* Relevant kunskap om Azure-plattformen



  





 Det är positivt om du har erfarenhet av arbete i en större/komplex organisation. Vårt koncernspråk är svenska vilket ställer krav på att du talar och skriver svenska obehindrat.
 



 Du är en initiativtagare med förmåga att planera både på kort och lång sikt. Din positiva inställning gör att du lätt anpassar dig till olika omständigheter och situationer, och du behåller ditt konstruktiva arbetssätt även under press, stress och motgångar. Du bygger långvariga och hållbara relationer och värdesätter samarbete framför konkurrens. Din nyfikenhet på kunskap och din breda erfarenhet gör att du på ett flexibelt sätt kan analysera och lösa problem samt hantera utmaningar.
 



  





 Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper. Startdatum enligt överenskommelse.
 



  





**Det här erbjuder vi dig** 




 På trafikförvaltningen har du möjlighet att växa och utvecklas för ett helt yrkesliv. Här kan du vara expert och fokusera på ditt sakområde. Samtidigt som du jobbar i ett lag och i en organisation med stor bredd. Det finns stora möjligheter att röra sig mellan olika roller och uppgifter. Du har utrymme att forma din egen karriärväg och stärka både din personliga och professionella utveckling i en spännande och varierad miljö!
 



  





 Vi är en välkomnande och öppen arbetsplats där vi stöttar och hjälper varandra. Vi vet att nyckeln för att vi ska klara vårt uppdrag – är medarbetare som trivs, mår bra och kan utvecklas på jobbet. Därför lägger vi stor vikt vid att säkerställa hållbarhet i vårt arbetssätt, bland annat genom att erbjuda flexibilitet i vardagen och hybridarbete när möjlighet finns.
 



  





 Årligen erbjuds hälsoundersökning och friskvårdsbidrag på 5 000 kr. Hälsospåret, vår friskvårdssatsning, innehåller en rad olika hälsofrämjande aktiviteter. SL-kort är en annan uppskattad förmån hos oss. Läs mer om våra förmåner här.
 



  





**Välkommen med din ansökan!** 




 I denna rekrytering samarbetar vi med Experis. Vid frågor om tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta rekryteringskonsulter Pia Boström, 0703 14 68 66.
 



  





 Vi använder tester för att säkra objektiva bedömningar. Ansökan sker via vår hemsida, vi har inte möjlighet att ta emot ansökningar via e-post. Endast CV önskas.
 







 Ansök redan i dag eftersom intervjuer kan ske löpande. Sista ansökningsdag är 11 november. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
 



  





 Tjänsten är placerad i säkerhetsklass och en säkerhetsprövning innefattande säkerhetsprövningssamtal och registerkontroll kommer att genomföras innan anställning. I vissa fall ställs krav på svenskt medborgarskap för säkerhetsklassade tjänster.
 



  





 Eventuella arbetsprov kan bli aktuella för tjänsten.

title: Management Systems Transformation Intern
description:
**Unpaid Internship Opportunity at SwedBNB: Management System Transformation Project** 




  
 



**About SwedBNB:** 




  
 



 SwedBNB is a short-term rental property management company in Sweden, managing over 65 properties across the country and serving as one of Airbnb’s preferred partner in Sweden. As we continue our rapid growth, we are committed to continuously improving our operations and technology to deliver exceptional service to property owners and guests alike.
 



  
 



**Position: Management Systems Transformation Intern** 




  
 



 •                            
 **Location** 
 : Stockholm, Sweden
 



 •                            
 **Duration** 
 : 6 months
 



 •                            
 **Start Date** 
 : Flexible
 



 •                            
 **Compensation** 
 :
 
 Unpaid 
 



  





**Role Overview:** 




  
 



 SwedBNB is seeking a highly motivated and analytical 
 **Management Systems Transformation Intern** 
  to support a strategic review and overhaul of our property management software. This internship offers a unique opportunity to work closely with SwedBNB’s leadership team and play a key role in a critical digital transformation project.
 



  
 



 The successful candidate will be responsible for:
 



  
 



                1.            
 **Assessing the Value of Current Software** 
 : Conduct a comprehensive evaluation of our existing property management platform, focusing on its functionality, efficiency, and alignment with business objectives.
 



                2.            
 **Identifying Alternative Solutions** 
 : Research and present 
 **three potential SaaS solutions** 
  that can enhance our operational capabilities. The solutions should be analyzed for their fit within SwedBNB’s existing operations, scalability, cost-effectiveness, and overall impact on user experience.
 



                3.            
 **Leading the Implementation and Transition** 
 : Once the new software is selected, you will develop and execute a 
 **complete transition plan** 
 , leading the migration process and ensuring a seamless changeover to the new platform. This will include:
 



                •              
 **Project Plan** 
 : Creating a detailed project roadmap, including key milestones, timelines, and resource allocation.
 



                •              
 **KPIs** 
 : Developing success metrics to monitor the implementation, ensuring minimal disruption to operations and achievement of business objectives.
 



  
 



**Key Responsibilities:** 




  
 



                •             Perform a detailed 
 **SWOT analysis** 
  of the current property management software.
 



                •             Research and evaluate 
 **three potential SaaS alternatives** 
 , providing comprehensive reports on each.
 



                •             Lead the development of a 
 **transition plan** 
 , including data migration, user training, and post-implementation support.
 



                •             Work closely with internal stakeholders to ensure alignment with business goals and operational requirements.
 



                •             Develop and monitor 
 **KPIs** 
  throughout the project lifecycle to ensure timely delivery and successful software adoption.
 



                •             Present findings and recommendations to SwedBNB’s senior leadership team.
 



  
 



**Desired Qualifications:** 




  
 



                •             Currently pursuing a degree in 
 **Management, Economics, Business Administration** 
 , or a related field.
 



                •             Strong 
 **analytical** 
  skills with the ability to assess and measure complex software systems and business processes.
 



                •             Proficiency in 
 **project management** 
  and familiarity with digital transformation initiatives.
 



                •             A keen interest in management, operations and digital solutions.
 



                •             Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English, with the ability to present detailed analysis and recommendations.
 



                •             Proactive and resourceful, with the ability to lead projects and drive results in a fast-paced environment.
 



  
 



**What We Offer:** 




  
 



                •              
 **Hands-on experience** 
  in managing a full-scale digital transformation project.
 



                •             The opportunity to work directly with senior leadership in a growing company.
 



                •             A dynamic work environment with significant ownership over project outcomes.
 



                •             Mentorship from industry experts and a fast-paced, growth-oriented team.
 



  
 



 This is an excellent opportunity for a forward-thinking, strategic individual who wants to gain hands-on experience in management consulting and digital transformation within a growing property management company. You will be empowered to lead, innovate, and make a measurable impact on SwedBNB’s future operations.
 



  
 



**Application:** 




  
 



 Please submit your CV and a cover letter detailing your interest in the role and relevant experience to operations@swedbnb.se
 



  
 



 At SwedBNB, we are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive workplace and welcome applications from all qualified individuals.

title: Presale specialist inom Cyber Security
description:
***Vi på Iver ger samma löfte till våra kollegor som till våra kunder. Löftet är att alltid vara ”beside you”, ”behind you” och ”before you”. Vi kallar det för ”The Iver way”.***
*Har du en passion för cybersäkerhet och försäljning? Vill du vara med och skydda företag mot cyberhot genom att erbjuda avancerade säkerhetslösningar? Vi söker nu en Presale specialist med starkt kommersiellt fokus inom cybersäkerhet till vårt team!
 *Är du vår nya kollega?**
**Om Cyberdefense**
 Cyberdefense at Iver är en fristående affärsenhet inom Iver som enbart fokuserar på att skydda företag mot de ständigt växande cyberhoten. Genom innovativa tjänster och djup kompetens inom cybersäkerhetsområdet hjälper vi våra kunder att säkra sin IT-infrastruktur och sina affärsprocesser.
   

  

**Din roll på Iver?**
 Som Presale specialist inom cybersäkerhet kommer du att spela en avgörande roll i att identifiera och utveckla nya affärsmöjligheter inom området. Du kommer att arbeta proaktivt med att hitta potentiella kunder och skapa nya affärsmöjligheter, samt att arbeta tillsammans med våra kundansvariga i olika upphandlingsprocesser och merförsäljningsprojekt. Genom att bygga och upprätthålla långsiktiga relationer med både interna och externa intressenter, säkerställer du att vi kan leverera skräddarsydda lösningar som möter våra kunders specifika behov inom Cyber security.
   

  

**Huvudsakliga Arbetsuppgifter**
* Identifiera nya affärsmöjligheter.
* Agera rådgivare till och samarbeta med våra övriga försäljningsteam.
* Genomföra omfattande behovsanalyser för att förstå kundens unika utmaningar och därefter presentera skräddarsydda säkerhetslösningar.
* Delta i vidareutveckling av vår tjänsteportfölj inom cybersäkerhet.
* Du kommer att arbeta tillsammans med våra tekniska experter för att säkerställa att de lösningar vi erbjuder är optimala och tekniskt solida.
* Delta aktivt i marknadsföringsaktiviteter och branschevenemang för att öka vår synlighet och utöka vårt professionella nätverk.


 Du kommer att spela en nyckelroll i att säkerställa att våra kunder får den bästa möjliga servicen och att vi kan bygga långsiktiga, framgångsrika affärsrelationer. Denna roll erbjuder en spännande möjlighet att arbeta i framkant av cybersäkerhet, med stor variation i arbetsuppgifter och möjligheten att göra en verklig skillnad för våra kunder.
   

  

**Vad erbjuder vi dig?**
**Iver - Where technology meets business.** 
 Hos Iver får du möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste tekniken och vara med på en spännande tillväxtresa. Iver är ett bolag med entreprenöriella rötter och en kultur som präglas av flexibilitet och samarbete. Vårt mål är att våra kunder – här i Norden och internationellt – ska se oss som en ledande partner för digital transformation.
   

  

 På Iver är vi inkluderande och strävar efter genuint samarbete där vi arbetar mot gemensamma mål. Inom Iver finns stora möjligheter till utveckling och vi står bakom dig när du vill lära dig mer – inom ditt specialområde, ledarskap eller nya områden.
   

  

 Hos Iver är du också en del av ett ambitiöst och innovativt företag, vilket innebär att förbättra, testa, utvärdera och våga ändra hur vi gör saker är viktiga ingredienser och vi är övertygade om att det är så vi utvecklas.
 **We’re not big blue. We’re yellow.** 
 Stora nog att skala och agila nog att innovera.
   

  

**Vem söker vi?**
 För att lyckas i rollen som presale specialist inom cybersäkerhet tror vi att du har några års erfarenhet av försäljning inom IT-säkerhet. Du har en stark förståelse för cybersäkerhet och dess utmaningar, vilket gör dig till en värdefull rådgivare för våra kunder. Du har inga bekymmer att ifrågasätta kundkrav och du besitter förmågan att hjälpa kunden hitta den bästa lösningen, även om det innebär att ställa svåra frågor.
   

  

 Vidare tror vi att du är självständig och en lagspelare, vilket gör att du kan arbeta effektivt på egen hand såväl som i samarbete med kollegor. Samt besitter en hög grad av självdisciplin och driv för att vara framgångsrik i rollen.
   

  

**Du Har**
* Dokumenterad erfarenhet av framgångsrik försäljning av komplexa cybersäkerhetsaffärer.
* Erfarenhet av att förmedla komplexa säkerhetslösningar på ett enkelt och övertygande sätt.
* Goda kommunikations och prestations färdigheter inklusive upphandlingar.
* Obehindrad kommunikation på svenska och engelska i både tal och skrift.


*Då rollen ingår i vårt affärsområde inom Cyberdefense genomför vi mer omfattade bakgrundskontroller under denna rekryteringsprocess för att möta våra kunders säkerhetskrav.*
**Placeringsort**
 Vi finns på 25 kontor runt om i Sverige och Norge. Placeringsort för denna roll är på vårat kontor i Solna.
   

  

**Sök till oss!**
 Urval sker löpande, tjänsten kan tillsättas före sista ansökningsdag. Iver eftersträvar en jämn könsfördelning och värdesätter etnisk och kulturell mångfald. Önskad start är snarast eller enligt överenskommelse. Sista ansökningsdag: 2024-10-15. Du är välkommen att kontakta Poonam Jain (poonam.jain@iver.se) vid frågor eller funderingar kring tjänsten. Vi ser fram emot din ansökan!
   

  

 Välkommen till Iver!

title: Entry-level communications specialist
description:
Be the voice of Canonical on social media
   

  

 We're on the lookout for an energetic and creative colleague to join our communications team. The ideal person for this role does not necessarily have experience in the field but is driven to learn, improve and come up with campaign concepts that make our brand stand out on social media. In this entry-level role, you will have the opportunity to build a career with a community-focused brand that touches every aspect of the modern technology stack.
   

  

 Our social media provides a window between the people who make our products and those who use them. With audiences in the millions, our online communities have the opportunity to talk to us, engage with us, provide feedback and be involved in the world of Ubuntu. From #opensource to coffee on K8s, launch previews to twitter storms over some cool release swag, our marketing team is committed to creating conversations with audiences all over planet earth: developers, tech enthusiasts, security engineers...
   

  

 The ideal candidate is passionate about technology, technology marketing and the use of technology in marketing. They would love to gain experience owning campaigns and collaborate with others to make them happen. They enjoy learning and improving themselves, the team and the organisation. They problem solve, get hands-on, experiment, measure and use automation to make daily life easier. To succeed in this role, the candidate must be driven, organised and attentive to detail.
   

  

 This role sits in the communications team reporting to the director of communications.
   

  

**Location:** 
*This role will be based remotely in the EMEA region.*
 What your day will look like
   

  

* Develop, schedule and publish content across multiple social media platforms
* Share regular updates and reporting on social media metrics, content performance and campaigns results
* Support the growth and nurturing of Canonical's social media audiences, while increasing engagement rates and valuable actions
* Develop flair with copywriting and asset creation to create messaging that aligns with the brand and its personality, and drives audiences towards action
* Be responsible for executing A/B and multivariate growth tests
* Be audience centric, focusing on platform and community moderation, as well as direct audience engagement
* Create awareness on integrated campaigns, product launches, webinar series, industry announcements and core content.
* Package all of Canonical's product offerings and educational material creatively, from bare metal, AI, Kubernetes to chats on diversity and CSR.


 What we are looking for in you
   

  

* Understanding of social media and communications best practices
* Hands-on knowledge of social media management tools like Sprout Social, an understanding of web analytics tools (social and web like Google Analytics) is a plus
* Proficiency with at least four social media platforms including LinkedIn, YouTube, Twitter, Facebook, Instagram and Reddit
* An analytical eye and a good sense for the type of content that performs best depending on platform and objective
* Understanding of educational content funnels, and using video as a core social media marketing asset
* Exceptional interpersonal skills and aptitude for forging trusting relationships across diverse, cross-functional teams
* Excellent verbal and written communication skills, strong content marketer
* Proven ability to prioritise and differentiate what matters from the noise, meeting deadlines without sacrificing quality
* Affinity for planning is a must, experience with project management tools like Jira is an advantage
* Willingness to travel up to 4 times a year for internal events


**What we offer you**
 Your base pay will depend on various factors including your geographical location, level of experience, knowledge and skills. In addition to the benefits above, certain roles are also eligible for additional benefits and rewards including annual bonuses and sales incentives based on revenue or utilisation. Our compensation philosophy is to ensure equity right across our global workforce.
   

  

 In addition to a competitive base pay, we provide all team members with additional benefits, which reflect our values and ideals. Please note that additional benefits may apply depending on the work location and, for more information on these, please ask your Talent Partner.
   

  

 🏠Fully remote working environment - we've been working remotely since 2004!
   

  

 📚Personal learning and development budget of 2,000USD per annum
   

  

 💰Annual compensation review
   

  

 🏆Recognition rewards
   

  

 🏝 Annual holiday leave
   

  

 👶Parental Leave
   

  

 🧑‍💼Employee Assistance Programme
   

  

 🧳Opportunity to travel to new locations to meet colleagues at 'sprints'
   

  

 ✈️Priority Pass for travel and travel upgrades for long haul company events
   

  

**About Canonical**
 Canonical is a pioneering tech firm that is at the forefront of the global move to open source. As the company that publishes Ubuntu, one of the most important open source projects and the platform for AI, IoT and the cloud, we are changing the world on a daily basis. We recruit on a global basis and set a very high standard for people joining the company. We expect excellence - in order to succeed, we need to be the best at what we do.
   

  

 Canonical has been a remote-first company since its inception in 2004. Work at Canonical is a step into the future, and will challenge you to think differently, work smarter, learn new skills, and raise your game. Canonical provides a unique window into the world of 21st-century digital business.
   

  

**Canonical is an equal opportunity employer**
 We are proud to foster a workplace free from discrimination. Diversity of experience, perspectives, and background create a better work environment and better products. Whatever your identity, we will give your application fair consideration.

title: Presales Consultant
company_industry: Software Development, IT Services and IT Consulting, and Technology, Information and Media
description:
Presales Consultant / Presales Engineer / Sales Engineer / Technical Sales / Solution Consultant / Solution Engineer - SAP S4/HANA (Finance, Sourcing & Procurement) / SAP Consultant
 



  





**We are looking for a Nordic speaker (preferable Swedish or Norwegian) SAP or ERP consultant who is open for relocating and working in sunny Barcelona (3 days per week on site).** 




  





 Our client is one of the world's largest enterprise software vendor and a partner for SAP ERP solutions with over 100,000 employees, 150+ global offices and $30 billion revenue.
 



  





 They are looking for a Nordics speaking SAP S4 HANA presales consultant to join their digital hub in Barcelona, focused on the mid market clients across different domains:
 



  





 -Support the Nordic speaking sales team in Barcelona and the sales team in Nordic regions;
 



 -Map product capabilities to requirements of prospects to support the selling of solutions and services with a specialization in the nuances of digital sales techniques
 



 -Act as domain experts and spokesperson(s) for designated solution or product segment
 



 -Design and deliver creative solution demonstrations and presentations to potential mid market clients across high tech, retail, ecommerce, banking, finance industries
 



 -Demonstrate the product value and facilitate tailored solutions proposals for clients
 



  





 Experience:
 



 -3 years + experience working as presales or sales engineer or solution engineer or solution consultant;
 



**-Must have experience in ERP, ideally SAP S4 or competitors such as Dynamics, Infor, Oracle, Sage, Workday, Netsuite, etc.** 




 -Knowledge in finance or sourcing and procurement is a big plus
 



 -Strong client facing experience and being creative
 



**-Must speak one of the Nordic languages, preferable Swedish or Norwegian** 




**-Willing to relocate to Barcelona** 




  





**Full time permanent position, hybrid working 3 days based in Barcelona. Offer 55k Euro to 76k Euro base salary plus bonus (80%/20% split, 70k to 95k OTE) and full benefits.**

title: Enterprise Architect till BankID, Stockholm
description:
*Genom snabb och säker digital identifiering möjliggör vi ett modernt och tillgängligt samhälle.* 
 Finansiell ID-Teknik är företaget bakom BankID, Sveriges mest använda lösning för digital identifiering och underskrift. Idag använder över 8 miljoner svenskar BankID och flertalet myndigheter, banker och andra företag har BankID i sina e-tjänster. Vår ledstjärna är säkerhet och i alla lägen säkrar vi användarnas identitet och integritet. Vi är en liten organisation med stor kompetens och ett samhällsviktigt uppdrag. Här jobbar vi nära tillsammans för att tillhandahålla säker, snabb och tillgänglig digital identifiering och underskrift till det svenska samhället. Vårt kontor finns i centrala Stockholm.
 **Om tjänsten** 
 Som Enterprise Architect ansvarar du tillsammans med arkitekturteamet för att planera, utveckla och utforma vår arkitektur på ett sätt som stödjer verksamhetens affärsmål och strategi.Rollen innebär att ta ansvar för helhetsperspektivet av vår arkitektur, stötta övriga i teamet att förstå och diskutera systemarkitektur, arbeta fram och underhålla referensarkitektur och molnbaserad arkitektur samt säkerställa att vi följer gemensam teknikpraxis.I arbetsuppgifterna ingår bland annat att översätta affärskrav till tekniska krav, planera teknikskiften och teknikförbättringar samt delta och driva utredningar för teknikval. Du kommer dessutom ha en viktig roll i att bevaka vår omvärld för att se till att vi håller oss relevanta och konkurrenskraftiga på marknaden.
 **Är det här d** 
**u?** 
 För att lyckas i rollen som Enterprise Architect behöver du ha relevant akademisk utbildning och mångårig erfarenhet av utveckling och arkitektroller som System Architect, Enterprise Architect eller liknande. Du har erfarenhet av att arbeta fram och underhålla referensarkitektur samt förståelse för arkitektval och hur de påverkar. Du har tidigare arbetat tvärfunktionellt och är trygg med att framföra komplexa lösningar på ett begripligt sätt. Vidare har du god förmåga att dokumentera ditt arbete.Det är meriterande om du har utvecklarbakgrund, har jobbat inom bank och finans samt med system som har höga krav på säkerhet och tillgänglighet.Vi fäster stor vikt vid personliga egenskaper och söker dig som är positiv, lösningsorienterad och kommunikativ. Vi ser gärna att du är strukturerad, har ett metodiskt arbetssätt samt besitter en god analytisk förmåga. Det är viktigt att du har tålamod att driva långsiktiga frågor förmågan att tydligt förmedla information i både tal och skrift på svenska och engelska. Vidare är du prestigelös och trygg med en god fingertoppskänsla samt trivs som bäst när du arbetar tillsammans med andra.
 **Om oss** 
 På BankID drivs vi av att bidra till samhällskritisk infrastruktur som är till stor nytta för många människor. Det gör vi som ett team och vår strävan är att hela tiden att bli bättre tillsammans. Inkluderande samarbeten är en förutsättning för att nå högt engagemang och goda resultat. Vi strävar efter att både egna medarbetare och leverantörer vi samarbetar med ska känna sig som del av ett team med gemensamma mål.Vi är ett ”Great place to work”-certifierat bolag. ”Great Place to work” definierar en utmärkt arbetsplats så här: ”En utmärkt arbetsplats är en där man litar på människorna man arbetar för, känner stolthet för det man gör och trivs med människorna man jobbar tillsammans med.Läs gärna mer om oss i vår hållbarhetsrapport: https://www.bankid.com/assets/bankid/files/hallbarhetsrapport\_2022\_webb.pdf
 **Vill du veta mer?** 
 I denna rekrytering samarbetar BankID med Level Recruitment. Vänligen sök tjänsten genom att klicka på "ansök"-knappen här intill. Vid frågor vänligen kontakta Senior Rekryteringskonsult Lynn Sjöberg Westander på 08-120 50 431. Urvalet av ansökningar sker löpande. Välkommen in med din ansökan!
   

  

 Om företaget
   

  

 Finansiell ID-Teknik är företaget bakom BankID. Idag använder över 8 miljoner svenskar BankID och flertalet myndigheter, banker och andra företag har BankID i sina tjänster. Vår ledstjärna är säkerhet och i alla lägen säkrar vi användarnas identitet och integritet. Vi är en liten organisation med stor kompetens och ett samhällskritiskt uppdrag. Här jobbar vi nära tillsammans för att leverera säker och snabb digital identifiering och underskrift till det svenska samhället. Vårt kontor finns i centrala Stockholm.
   

  

**Kontaktperson** 
 Lynn Sjöberg Westander
   

  

**Tjänstens omfattning** 
 Heltid
 **Anställningsform** 
 Permanent
 **Placeringsort** 
 Stockholm

title: Infrastrukturspecialist inom VMware
description:
Brinner du för infrastruktur och teknik, och tycker du om att ligga i framkant med de senaste lösningarna? Vågar du utmana kunder med nya tekniska lösningar och förbättringar? I takt med att vår kund växer, söker de nu förstärkning till deras konsultteam inom Infrastruktur och VMware. Vi söker dig som är en senior infrastrukturspecialist med spetskompetens inom VMware och som vill bli deras expert inom området.
 



  





 Område: Solna
 



 Start: Omgående, med hänsyn till uppsägningstid
 



  





 Tjänsten inleds som ett konsultuppdrag med ambitionen att gå över till kund.
 



  





 Som konsult på Centric får du en trygg anställning och samlar på dig värdefull arbetslivserfarenhet på uppdrag hos våra kunder. Din konsultchef stöttar dig i din utveckling där du hela tiden fyller på med nya erfarenheter och kunskaper. En utmärkt möjlighet att göra karriär.
 



  





**Dina arbetsuppgifter** 




 I rollen som infrastrukturspecialist kommer du att arbeta med design, implementering och förvaltning av avancerade VMware-miljöer och Windows-miljöer. Du kommer att ansvara för att skapa och underhålla robusta och skalbara infrastrukturlösningar samt agera rådgivare inom ditt expertområde. Du förväntas också arbeta med dokumentation och förbättring av befintliga system. Du kommer att tillhöra ett team som idag består av sju personer som alla arbetar inom nätverk och infrastruktur.
 



  





**Din profil och kvalifikationer** 
 För att trivas i rollen drivs du av att ge bra service och arbeta mot både individuella och gemensamma mål. Du är en teamspelare, flexibel och har förmågan att hantera ett varierande tempo. Du trivs med att ta eget ansvar och att arbeta både självständigt och i grupp.
 



  





 Vi söker dig med minst 10 års erfarenhet inom infrastruktur och djup kunskap inom VMware. Du har erfarenhet av att designa och förvalta komplexa infrastrukturlösningar från grunden. Du har ett stort tekniskt intresse, är självgående och stresstålig. Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.
 



  





*För att passa för rollen behöver du ha kompetenser inom:* 



* VMware-produkter och lösningar (vSphere, vSAN, NSX)
* Windows Server-miljöer (AD, DNS, DHCP, GPO)
* Design och implementering av infrastrukturlösningar
* Erfarenhet som konsult och rådgivare inom infrastruktur
* Automatisering och orkestrering av infrastrukturer
* Molnintegrationer (Azure, AWS)
* Drift och underhåll av stora, komplexa system



  





**Meriterande Erfarenheter** 



* Säkerhetslösningar inom VMware
* Outsourcing
* Projektledning enligt PPS-modellen



  





**Vad vi erbjuder** 




 Vi hjälper dig att nå dina personliga mål. Vi tycker nämligen att alla våra medarbetare hela tiden ska fortsätta att utvecklas, oavsett om de är juniorer eller har några år på nacken. Därför erbjuder vi alla våra konsulter kvalificerade utbildningar och certifieringar inom den senaste tekniken. Och inte nog med det – du som konsult får även lägga upp en individuell utbildningsplan utifrån dina speciella intresseområden, där vi tar notan för både studiematerial och certifieringar. Hos oss på Centric kommer du snabbt in i gemenskapen genom våra interna och externa aktiviteter där vi träffas och hittar på något roligt tillsammans.
 



  





 Centric är ett IT-företag med 400 anställda, med kontor i Stockholm, Göteborg och Linköping. Vi specialiserar oss på uthyrning av generalister och förmedling av specialister samt erbjuder outsourcing och systemlösningar inom retail. Vi är medlem i Almega Kompetensföretagen och följer deras tecknade kollektivavtal med Unionen.

title: Senior Microsoft Identity Management Expert
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd som konsult och arbetar hos kund alt. interna åtaganden gentemot våra kunder.
   

  

**Vår ambitioner**
 Vår målsättning är att vara det ledande IT-konsultföretaget med de mest nöjda medarbetarna och kunderna. Hos oss arbetar du inte för cheferna – ledarskapet är här för att stötta dig. Vi sätter dig i centrum och strävar efter att du ska utvecklas och växa. Vi erbjuder en inspirerande arbetsmiljö med god stämning, intressanta projekt hos intressanta kunder och en stark kultur av kunskapsdelning. Vi har tilltro till våra medarbetares innovationskraft och ger dig och dina kollegor möjlighet att både utvidga och fördjupa era kunskaper.
   

  

**Identitetshanteringstjänster från leverantören består initialt av följande områden:**
* Hantering av IDM-systemet (Microsoft Identity Manager initialt)
* Övervakning och hantering av Microsoft AD och Entra ID-miljöer
* Hantering av hela kundens identitetshanteringsarkitektur
* IDoch åtkomsträttigheter (inklusive användare, enheter, tjänster och applikationsidentiteter)
* Underhåll och utveckling av automatisering


**Expertkompetens inom Microsoft Identity Manager**
**minst 5 års erfarenhet** 
 av hantering av
 **Microsoft Identity Manager-produkten** 
 , samt underhåll och utveckling av tjänsten.
   

  

**Expertkompetens – Azure AD / Entra ID och identitetshantering**
**minst 5 års erfarenhet** 
 av kvalificerat underhåll av
 **Azure AD/Entra ID-tjänster** 
 , identitetshantering och implementering av åtkomsträttigheter.
   

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 
 15-10-2024
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.
   

  

 🌟 En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.
   

  

 🚗 Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.
   

  

 💼 Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.
   

  

 🌴 Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester?
   

  

 🏥 Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.
   

  

 📚 Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.
   

  

 🕑 Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?
   

  

**Om Deploja**
 Vi sysselsätter idag seniora IT-specialister, inom bl.a. utveckling, test, testledning, projektledning, databas, Drift, Linux och ser oss alltid om efter fler kompetenta medarbetare.
   

  

 Transparens och flexibilitet är i alla fall viktigt för oss, med oss får man som konsult majoriteten av sin egen intäkt, i snitt har våra medarbetare höjt sin ersättning med 43% och har samtidigt ett av marknadens bästa förmånspaket. De som är med på vår resa idag har en trygg anställning MEN sätter sin egen lön och bestämmer själva över sina förmåner så som pension, utbildning, arbetstid och tjänstebil.
   

  

 Våra kunder finns bland annat inom detaljhandel, bank/finans/försäkring, energi, transport och offentlig sektor. De flesta av våra kunder är i Stockholmsregionen men vi har även kunder i andra delar av landet.
   

  

* Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket garanterar vi ej återkoppling.

title: Information Technology Technician
description:
*We are seeking a motivated IT Support Technician with junior experience to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a solid understanding of IT systems and a desire to advance their technical expertise. As an IT Support Technician, you will work with our experienced IT team to provide reliable and efficient technical support to our employees, ensuring smooth day-to-day operations across the organization.* 




  





**Responsibilities** 



* Provide technical assistance and support for incoming IT incidents and service requests, escalating when necessary
* Troubleshoot and resolve software and hardware issues, including operating systems (Windows and macOS), applications, and peripherals
* Assist in the administration and maintenance of Azure AD and Microsoft 365 services
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to identify and implement IT process improvements
* Assist with the management and maintenance of video conference infrastructure (experience in this area is optional)
* Maintain accurate and up-to-date documentation of IT procedures, configurations, and system inventories
* Participate in training sessions to enhance technical skills and stay updated with industry trends
* Provide training and guidance to end-users on technology usage and best practices



  





**Qualifications** 



* Minimum 1 year of experience in an IT support role
* Understanding of IT systems, including hardware, software, and networking
* Experience with Microsoft Windows and macOS operating systems
* Familiarity with Azure AD and Microsoft 365 services is a plus
* Experience with automation and Powershell scripting is a plus
* Strong problem-solving skills and a continuous learning mindset
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with a customer-oriented mindset
* Ability to work collaboratively within a team and independently when required



  





  





*Nordic Capital is a leading private equity investor with a resolute commitment to creating stronger, sustainable businesses through operational improvement and transformative growth. Nordic Capital focuses on selected regions and sectors where it has deep experience and a long history. Focus sectors are Healthcare, Technology & Payments, Financial Services, and selectively, Industrial & Business Services. Key regions are Europe and globally for Healthcare and Technology & Payments investments. Since inception in 1989, Nordic Capital has invested over EUR 22 billion in more than 130 investments. The most recent entities are Nordic Capital XI with EUR 9.0 billion in committed capital and Nordic Capital Evolution with EUR 1.2 billion in committed capital, principally provided by international institutional investors such as pension funds. Nordic Capital Advisors have local offices in Sweden, the UK, the US, Germany, Denmark, Finland, Norway and South Korea. For further information about Nordic Capital, please visit* 
***www.nordiccapital.com.***

title: DataBricks Data Engineer
description:
We are hiring for "Databricks Data Engineer" with hands on experience on Unity tool for one of the leading Swedish Bank in S
 
 tockholm.
 



  






 Key Responsibilities:
 





 ⦁ Design and implement scalable data pipelines on Databricks, Databricks Unity and Apache Spark.
 





 ⦁ Develop, test, and maintain ETL solutions using PySpark and SQL.
 





 ⦁ Build data models and optimize performance for efficient data processing and analytics.
 





 ⦁ Collaborate with data scientists, analysts, and other stakeholders to understand requirements and deliver data solutions.
 





 ⦁ Implement best practices for data governance, data security, and data quality management.
 





 ⦁ Monitor and troubleshoot performance bottlenecks in data pipelines and optimize them for efficiency.
 





 ⦁ Lead efforts in the migration of data solutions to Databricks from legacy systems.
 





 ⦁ Work closely with cloud architects to ensure seamless integration with cloud data platforms (e.g., Azure, AWS, GCP).
 





 ⦁ Participate in code reviews and provide mentorship to junior engineers.
 





 Required Skills & Qualifications:
 





 ⦁ 6+ years of experience in data engineering, with at least 3+ years of hands-on experience on Databricks.
 





 ⦁ Expertise in Apache Spark and PySpark.
 





 ⦁ Strong knowledge of SQL and relational databases.
 




  






 Interested candidates kindly share your resume at
 
 neha.verma@bytespoke.com
 




 Note- No sponsorship is provided by the client. only those who have work permit for Sweden is eligible to apply.

title: Data Scientist
description:
Do you also believe in everyone's right to affordable, good and sustainable food? Do you want to be part of a journey in an exciting industry where innovation, commitment and drive are important ingredients? Welcome to the Axfood family!
   

  

 Through our group's many brands, competencies and backgrounds, we have the power to make a difference together - for real. Now we are looking for you who want to be part of developing tomorrow's grocery trade.
   

  

**Become one of us**
 As a Data Scientist at Axfood AB you will be a part of Advanced Analytics which is a key component of our central department, Strategy & Business Development. Our team's mission is to establish Axfood as a leader in AI innovation within the grocery retail industry.
   

  

 We specialize in developing and maintaining end-to-end machine learning and advanced analytics pipelines, driving Axfood to become more data driven. Our team focuses on building models for various business units, including e-commerce, loyalty programs (e.g., Willys Plus, Klubb Hemköp), digital marketing, and broader AI initiatives across the Axfood group. We collaborate closely with IT, business developers, e-commerce specialists, and business analysts within the group.
   

  

**This Is What You Will Do**
 As a Data Scientist, you’ll develop and productionize machine learning and analytical models that support different areas of Axfood’s business. Our work includes predictive modelling, recommender systems, clustering algorithms, and generative AI applications.
   

  

 You will work with a team of other Data Scientists, which means there will be good opportunities to grow and learn by working together. Working on a project usually involves end-to-end responsibility which means responsibility for project design, model development, productionizing pipelines, follow-up and maintenance. Therefore, it’s important to have a good collaboration with the team and other stakeholders. This responsibility also means that there is room for creativity in project design, and ultimately that you’ll have a direct impact on Axfood’s success.
   

  

 Being a Data Scientist at Axfood, you will be working with a modern, cloud-based platform to build models. You will develop models using Python and SQL for programming and mainly using AWS SageMaker and Airflow for development and orchestration of pipelines.
   

  

**This Is What We Exect From You**
 We believe you have at least a couple of years’ experience as a Data Scientist or Machine Learning Engineer, with a solid foundation in AI/ML theory and hands-on experience. You also have a degree in data science, computer science, statistics, engineering, mathematics or equivalent experience.
   

  

 You excel at problem-solving, cross-collaboration with other teams and stakeholders and translating business needs into data science projects that can run in production. You have a scientific mindset, appreciate the importance of sound theory and have the skills to build robust and scalable code. You strive to create tangible value with the models you build.
   

  

 As a person you are an analytical and creative problem solver with strong communication and collaboration skills. You’re proficient in English, both written and spoken. Knowledge of Swedish (verbal and written) is very desirable since the working language is Swedish.
   

  

**Preferred skills and experience:**
* Working with large data sets
* Developing machine learning models (predictive modelling, recommender systems, clustering etc.)
* Productionizing model pipelines, from data preparation and model training to deployment and monitoring (end-to-end)
* Uplift modelling (modelling individual treatment effects)
* A/B testing
* Proficiency in SQL and Python
* Airflow (or similar) for orchestrating pipelines
* Version control (Git) and CI/CD tools (Bitbucket, GitHub or Gitlab)
* Working with cloud platforms such as AWS (preferred), Azure or GCP
* Working with Jira


 The position is a permanent employment with a start date as soon as possible or by agreement. The placement is at our headquarters, Torsplan Stockholm.
   

  

**Additional Information**
 Do you fit the above profile? Do not hesitate to apply today! Applications are processed on a rolling basis and the position may be filled before the deadline of November 3. We only accept applications through our job pages.
   

  

 If you would like to know more about what the position entails, please contact: Björn Blomqvist, Head of AI-strategy e-mail: bjorn.blomqvist@axfood.se.
   

  

 To find out if we are the right fit for each other, our recruitment process includes tests and interviews.
   

  

 We also conduct background checks for all recruitments. The job application process at Axfood | Axfood
   

  

 Please note that during this process, we will not ask you to log in with your Bank ID, enter a password or scan a QR code. For further questions please contact our employee support at jobb@axfood.se
   

  

**About Axfood**
 The group consists of a family of brands and is unique in the Swedish market. At Axfood, we believe in everyone's right to affordable, good and sustainable food. It includes the retail chains Willys and Hemköp, as well as Tempo and Handlar'n. Wholesale sales are handled by Axfood Snabbgross and Dagab is responsible for the Group's product development, purchasing and logistics. Axfood also includes Urban Deli, as well as the partly-owned Apohem and Eurocash, City Gross and Mathem.

title: Measurement Solutions Consultant, Stockholm
company_industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals
description:
We’re looking for a Measurement Solutions Consultant to join Funnel in Stockholm. In this role, you will support the implementation and enhancement of Funnel’s Measurement Solutions for the EMEA market. This team is responsible for introducing Marketing Measurement as a new addition to Funnel’s product portfolio. Positioned at the intersection of data and business, this role is essential for establishing the Measurement function in the EMEA market.
   

  

**What You Will Do**
* Assist Funnel’s measurement clients in adopting best-in-class marketing measurement practices.
* Customize measurement models using our internal self-service MMM and triangulation system.
* Provide clients with advice on Measurement Strategy and Operations.
* Design, build, and support the operationalization of learning agendas in partnership with clients.
* Help clients leverage Funnel’s products to maximize return on investment.
* Present results and recommendations to clients, including management.
* Contribute to the creation of case studies and share best practices internally and externally.
* Stay updated on industry trends and client demands to influence product development and strategy, ensuring our offerings match market demand.


**Who You Are**
 You are a technically proficient and communicative professional with a keen interest in data-driven solutions. Your ability to engage with clients and comprehend their measurement needs distinguishes you in client interactions. You have a solid understanding of data generation processes and experience with basic data modeling, as well as an understanding of statistical KPIs and the ability to choose suitable models for clients.
   

  

**Skills And Experience**
* At least 2 years of experience in marketing analytics, with at least 1 year working with measurement solutions.
* Knowledge of modern methods for marketing measurement, such as Marketing Mix Modeling, Multi-Touch Attribution, and (quasi-) experimental methods.
* Practical experience with developing MMM or data-driven MTA models.
* Proficient in data wrangling and visualization skills (SQL, Excel, Tableau...).
* Bachelor's degree in a related field (e.g., Computer Science, Economics, Business, Mathematics, Statistics, Machine Learning, or Data Science).
* Strong communication and presentation skills.
* Excellent command of English (written and spoken).


**Who We Are**
 → Take a look at our
 **Funnel benefits** 
**!**
 Funnel is a Swedish-founded company with headquarters in Stockholm. Our SaaS product is designed to help marketing teams own their performance. Founded in 2014 in Stockholm, and still founder-led, the Funnel team has grown with our customers – serving more than 2,000 companies from our Stockholm, Boston, Dublin, Sydney and Hamburg offices.
   

  

 We have always put the customer first, expressed in a no-commission sales model and a customer-centric development approach. We are proud to help companies such as Havas Media, Adidas, Sony, and Home Depot to unlock the true impact of their data.
   

  

**Other Information**
 This role is located in our Stockholm office. We have an office-first approach and we value increased in-person collaboration and as such, we work four days a week from our office.
   

  

 We currently do not sponsor work visas and therefore we will take into consideration only applicants who:
   

  

* Hold Swedish citizenship
* Hold EU/EEA citizenship
* Have a valid work permit for working in Sweden

title: Data & Machine Learning Engineer
description:
**About Improvin'.**
 How would you like to make your mark? Do you want to help make the food industry more sustainable, field by field?
   

  

 Improvin’ exists to tackle one of the world's largest challenges: how to producing more food, more sustainably. Our solution focuses on primary production, the source of over 70% of the food industry’s emissions. We help food brands and processors to measure, report, and reduce the climate impact of their value chains.
   

  

 Our mission is both vital and urgent, demanded by consumers, legislators, and progressive food companies.
   

  

**About The Role.**
 As a Machine Learning Engineer at Improvin’, you’ll play a key role in building a platform that helps companies in the food industry lower their climate footprints. We’re looking for someone dedicated to creating value and improving the day-to-day lives of our users. For that, you’ll need a strong belief in our mission and a passion for building data products – everything from developing and maintaining ETL flows and our data lake to working hands-on with large datasets, building machine learning models, and integrating with our web platform.
   

  

 Machine learning will be increasingly used across our platform. Computer vision and remote sensing, such as field boundary and crop type detection, are already key areas and will continue to be important. Predictive models are also a major part of our future, with existing examples including yield prediction.
   

  

 You'll receive competitive compensation, 30 days of paid vacation, and a pension. We’ll strive to provide all the tools necessary for you to excel and support your professional growth as our fast-scaling business evolves.
   

  

**About The Team.**
 We use English as our working language. Our hybrid work setup is flexible, but we expect you to come into the office on a weekly basis. We accept applicants from both inside and outside the EU, and we’ll do our best to support your transition.
   

  

 Most importantly, we believe that a diverse workforce is essential to our success. We are committed to creating an inclusive workplace where all employees feel valued, respected, and supported, regardless of race, ethnicity, gender, sexual orientation, religion, age, or disability.
   

  

 How you make impact.
   

  

* Develop and maintain data-focused products and machine learning models with an emphasis on performance and availability.
* Design and implement scalable, reliable, and secure data processing pipelines, storage solutions, and databases.
* Monitor and troubleshoot data platform issues, implementing solutions to prevent future problems.
* Own and implement data security and privacy policies, including access control, encryption, and data masking
* Collaborate with software engineers, analysts, designers, C-level executives, and other stakeholders to understand data needs and develop solutions.


 We believe you have.
   

  

* Passion and drive to build high-quality data products, with proven involvement in end-to-end product development.
* A strong background in building scalable, reliable, and easy-to-maintain data-focused products.
* Preferably, a few years of experience in machine learning or MLOps projects.
* A proactive approach to identifying pain points, risks, and opportunities in an iterative development process.
* Good communication skills and a commitment to close collaboration with colleagues.
* Experience contributing actively to a team’s continuous work toward a shared technical vision.
* Experience with cloud-based solutions, orchestration, and containers.
* A strong willingness to learn, receive feedback, and a desire to grow both personally and professionally alongside your team.


 By applying, you'll have the opportunity to join a purpose-led, passionate, and international team.

title: Senior Solutions Architect
company_industry: Software Development, Computer Networking Products, and Computer and Network Security
description:
**Description**
 It’s an exciting time to be at Infoblox. Named a Top 25 Cyber Security Company by The Software Report and one of
 *Inc* 
 . magazine’s Best Workplaces for 2020, Infoblox is the leader in cloud-first networking and security services. Our solutions empower organizations to take full advantage of the cloud to deliver network experiences that are inherently simple, scalable, and reliable for everyone. Infoblox customers are among the largest enterprises in the world and include 70% of the Fortune 500 and 93 of the Fortune 100, and our success depends on bright, energetic, talented people who share a passion for building the next generation of networking technologies—and having fun along the way.
   

  

 We are looking for a Senior Solutions Architect in Sweden to join our NEUR sales team, reporting to the manager for the Solutions Architects team for the region. In this role, the main focus is working closely with our world-class sales team to overcome and remove all technical barriers in the sales process. This trusted technical advisor will help the sales team develop new business by working directly with customers and partners, effectively positioning Infoblox solutions.
   

  

 You’re the ideal candidate if you are a strategic thinker with a strong networking and security background, understand complex SaaS selling, work well independently, and are results-driven.
   

  

**What you’ll do:**
* Build business cases and technical differentiation in sales opportunities by educating customers and partners about Infoblox solution
* Develop pre-sales engineering content—presentations, demos, and webinars—on Infoblox solutions for customer and partner audiences
* Design solutions and architectural diagrams that convey proposed Infoblox solutions, how they will be engineered, and how they will integrate with other vendors
* Educate partner technical sales teams about Infoblox solutions and technologies and when/how they can identify opportunities and position Infoblox solutions to customers
* Work closely with your primary account manager and support the rest of the team in your areas of core competency
* Evaluate and identify new opportunities within existing accounts to expand with more Infoblox solutions


**What you’ll bring:**
* Experience in Cloud/Security space with working knowledge of design and implementation for at least one of the following: AWS, Azure, VMWare, Kubernetes, or HBSS, Nextgen Firewalls, TIPS, IPS/IDS, DevOps
* 3+ years of experience supporting technical sales or 5+ years of experience in engineering or operations networking
* 3+ years of experience in networking technologies, including TCP/IP, DNS, DHCP, LAN/WAN, Routing, Switching, Firewalls, IPv4/v6, UNIX Admin, and experience with switches, routers, and firewalls in Intranet/Internet/Extranet environments
* Strong knowledge of general security best practices and direct experience with at least one security product
* Strong interpersonal and presentation skills, with the ability to articulate complex technology simply
* Ability to work in the field frequently; travel is required
* Conscientious attitude and dependability, self-starter, ability to work independently while appreciating teamwork and communication
* DDI -- DNS/DHCP/IPAM experience
* CCSP, CISSP, CASP+, CySA+ CEH technical certifications a plus
* Bachelor's Degree
* Fluency in English, and Swedish


**What success looks like:**
 After six months, you will…
   

  

* Have a foundational knowledge of our entire product/solution portfolio
* Demonstrate fluency with either on-prem or SaaS-based Infoblox solutions
* Identify 1-2 specialization areas
* Capable of handling primary SA customer-facing tasks with only occasional help from others


**After About a Year, You Will…**
* Demonstrate fluency with all Infoblox solutions
* Capable of handling advanced SA customer-facing tasks with only occasional help from others
* Able to conduct POC’s & customer demo’s with little to no supervision
* Go-to person for specialization area for assigned region


**We’ve got you covered:**
 Our holistic
 **benefits** 
 package includes coverage of your health, wealth, and wellness—as well as a great work environment, employee programs, and company culture. We offer a competitive salary and benefits package and generous paid time off to help you balance your life. We have a strong culture and live our
 **values** 
 every day—we believe in transparency, curiosity, respect, and above all, having fun while delighting our customers.
   

  

**Why Infoblox?**
 We’ve created a culture that embraces
 **diversity, equity, and inclusion** 
 and rewards innovation, curiosity, and creativity. We achieve remarkable results by working together in a supportive environment that focuses on continuous learning and embraces change. So, whether you’re a software engineer, marketing manager, customer care pro, or product specialist, you belong here, where you will have the opportunity to grow and develop your career. Check out
 **what it’s like to be a Bloxer** 
 . We think you’ll be excited to join our team.

title: Data Scientist- GenAI
description:
Do you also believe in everyone's right to affordable, good and sustainable food? Do you want to be part of a journey in an exciting industry where innovation, commitment and drive are important ingredients? Welcome to the Axfood family!
   

  

 Through our group's many brands, competencies and backgrounds, we have the power to make a difference together - for real. Now we are looking for you who want to be part of developing tomorrow's grocery trade.
   

  

**Become one of us**
 As a Data Scientist at Axfood AB you will be a part of Advanced Analytics which is a key component of our central department, Strategy & Business Development. Our team's mission is to establish Axfood as a leader in AI innovation within the grocery retail industry.
   

  

 We specialize in developing and maintaining end-to-end machine learning and advanced analytics pipelines, driving Axfood to become more data driven. Our team focuses on building models for various business units, including e-commerce, loyalty programs (e.g., Willys Plus, Klubb Hemköp), digital marketing, and broader AI initiatives across the Axfood group. We collaborate closely with IT, business developers, e-commerce specialists, and business analysts within the group.
   

  

**This Is What You Will Do**
 As a Data Scientist, you’ll develop and productionize machine learning and analytical models that support different areas of Axfood’s business. The team you will be a part of work on predictive modelling, recommender systems, clustering algorithms and building AI solutions. In this role, you will focus on developing GenAI solutions to transform how we engage customers and deliver value across different areas of our business.
   

  

 You will work with a team of other Data Scientists, which means there will be good opportunities to grow and learn by working together. Working on a project usually involves end-to-end responsibility which means responsibility for project design, model development, productionizing pipelines, follow-up and maintenance. Therefore, it’s important to have a good collaboration with the team and other stakeholders. This responsibility also means that there is room for creativity in project design, and ultimately that you’ll have a direct impact on Axfood’s success.
   

  

 Being a Data Scientist at Axfood, you will be working with a modern, cloud-based platform to build models. You will develop models using Python and SQL for programming and mainly using AWS SageMaker and Airflow for development and orchestration of pipelines.
   

  

**This Is What We Expect From You**
 To excel in this role you need to have at least a couple years of experience as a Data Scientist or Machine Learning Engineer and have deep knowledge in machine learning/AI. We see that you have a degree in mathematics, computer science, physics, statistics, data science or equivalent engineering degree.
   

  

 You have deep knowledge in advanced modelling with different types of AI models - both traditional and generative - and a great interest in MLOps and building scalable code. We would also like to see that you have worked in projects building and delivering applications with generative AI and that you are excited about exploring new concepts in the world of data science and AI.
   

  

 As a person you are an analytical and creative problem solver with strong communication and collaboration skills. You’re proficient in English, both written and spoken. Knowledge of Swedish (verbal and written) is very desirable since the working language is Swedish.
   

  

**Preferred skills and experience:**
* Experience developing end-to-end machine learning solutions – from data preparation and model training to deployment and monitoring
* Experience with generative AI applications
* Proficiency in Python and SQL
* Working with large data sets
* Airflow (or similar) for orchestrating pipelines
* Version control (Git) and CI/CD tools (Bitbucket, GitHub or Gitlab)
* Working with cloud platforms such as AWS (preferred), Azure or GCP


 The position is a permanent employment with a start date as soon as possible or by agreement. The placement is at our headquarters, Torsplan Stockholm.
   

  

**Additional Information**
 Do you fit the above profile? Do not hesitate to apply today! Applications are processed on a rolling basis and the position may be filled before the deadline of November 3. We only accept applications through our job pages.
   

  

 If you would like to know more about what the position entails, please contact: Björn Blomqvist, Head of AI-strategy, e-mail: bjorn.blomqvist@axfood.se.
   

  

 To find out if we are the right fit for each other, our recruitment process includes tests and interviews.
   

  

 We also conduct background checks for all recruitments.The job application process at Axfood | Axfood
   

  

 Please note that during this process, we will not ask you to log in with your Bank ID, enter a password or scan a QR code. For further questions please contact our employee support at jobb@axfood.se
   

  

**About Axfood**
 The group consists of a family of brands and is unique in the Swedish market. At Axfood, we believe in everyone's right to affordable, good and sustainable food. It includes the retail chains Willys and Hemköp, as well as Tempo and Handlar'n. Wholesale sales are handled by Axfood Snabbgross and Dagab is responsible for the Group's product development, purchasing and logistics. Axfood also includes Urban Deli, as well as the partly-owned Apohem and Eurocash, City Gross and Mathem.

title: Enterprise Account Executive - MENA
description:
Open source software is the new default in the enterprise, and Canonical is the new challenger to major enterprise software vendors.
   

  

 We deliver better open source from the data center to cloud and edge. Our Linux distribution Ubuntu is now the leading platform for public cloud compute, and the favorite platform for software engineers, data scientists and AI developers. Our mission is to accelerate the adoption and quality of open source globally, and our goal is to ship the most software on the planet by cores. A tidal wave of open source innovation is the next phase of the entire enterprise software industry, and we aim to be the most compelling way to ride that wave.
   

  

 Our customers include Global 500 enterprises and startups. We are expanding our product range from the base operating system - Ubuntu - to full enterprise solutions in infrastructure and applications. We can deliver software defined storage, private cloud solutions, container runtime environments, as well as databases, message queues, identity, observability, analytics, machine learning and web publishing capabilities. Customers love the idea that they can get security compliance and support for everything open source from a single company. Our goal is to have more solutions on tap than any other vendor, and we have built unique capabilities to make that possible across every cloud, every class of compute and every category of application.
   

  

 Canonical provides licensed enterprise software products, commercial support, managed services, consulting and training services to customers who are deploying Ubuntu or open source applications on the cloud, in their data center, or to the connected device and IoT ecosystem. We are just over 1,000 colleagues in 70+ countries and $250m in revenue, profitable, on a steady but relentless growth trajectory. We are almost entirely distributed, with leadership spread across many countries. We believe that talent is equally distributed across the globe, and we are excited to hire, develop, promote and ultimately trust a diverse group of exceptional leads to build the best, not biggest, enterprise software company.
   

  

 We hire carefully and deliberately; our selection process is long and requires substantial work from applicants. It will take successful applicants three to six months to secure an offer. This is not a place to apply if you are in a rush to find a position, it is a worthwhile place to apply if you are ambitious and long-term in your thinking about your career and the dynamics which move the world forward. If you see clearly the rise of open source, and you understand the drivers of enterprise procurement and technical decision making, then you will understand why Canonical has such a tremendous long term advantage. You will also understand, given the ferocity of competition and the challenges of competing in a market of giants, that we have to set a very high bar for hiring and performance. In order to be a world leading company we select for exceptional ability as well as character, and then provide an environment which promotes teamwork and celebrates diligence, collaboration and effectiveness. All of those are easy to say but hard to do - at Canonical we are willing to be uncomfortable in pursuit of that excellence.
   

  

 In building our sales team, we look for five things:
   

  

* Empathy for the customer - a real understanding of customer needs, industry-specific challenges, and a desire to help customers solve their business problems
* High intellect - the ability to learn quickly, understand very complex subjects, and communicate clearly to build trust and confidence
* Passion for technology - a fascination with the state of the art from brilliant people solving hard problems, and fierce competition for large prizes
* Teamwork - a willingness to help others, to collaborate well with people from different disciplines, and to balance personal and team ambitions
* Energy - the drive to motivate oneself and others to achieve the best result for the team and our customers


 Ubuntu is already very widely adopted which gives us a credible basis for conversations in the market. Nevertheless, it requires real work for sales professionals to build on that adoption to create trusted and profitable commercial relationships with the enterprises in their territory. Our product managers and marketing teams run campaigns to generate awareness, engagement and leads, but you will need to go beyond managing inbound interest to develop the potential of your territory. You will need judgement as to which industries and companies are ready to go deeper with open source and Canonical, and energy to develop relationships in advance of proven interest. We expect professional practice, territory and account planning, as well as clear, complete and continuous reporting on pipeline status and activity, using standard professional tools.
   

  

 The successful candidate will carry an annual bookings quota within their assigned territory. They should be able to travel regionally for client engagement, industry conferences, and internationally for company events twice a year. They will be expected to demonstrate professionalism and effectiveness, to prospect accounts for new business, maintain and develop existing relationships, and work with colleagues and partners on account strategy. They must be comfortable selling enterprise software, open source, cloud, virtualization, container technologies and technical software solutions to senior levels of the enterprise.
